column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Aggggh-mazing brunch!!! You cannot go wrong with bottomless mimosas and bloody Mary's WITH an entree for 32$ I came here for my birthday brunch
column2: and the service was exquisite! No glass left unfilled
column3: and no entree left to be taken home
column4: it was ALL delicious! Management came out to check on everything
column5: and was extremely nice. I highly recommend a Sunday funday here!!!
